title: UBS' Mish on Private Credit AI Disruption Risk
description: Matthew Mish, Head of Public and Private Credit Strategy at UBS, discusses the evolving impact of AI disruption on credit markets. He tells Katie Greifeld and Bailey Lipschultz on "The Close" that markets are beginning to price in increased risk, particularly in the technology sector and leveraged loan space. (Source: Bloomberg)
